entry.title: Dell Latitude 7420, Intel i7-1185G7 vPro,14" 16GB 512GB PCIe SSD Carbon Fiber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dell
Type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Laptops & Netbooks:PC Laptops & Netbooks
Price: 1999.99




Dell Latitude 7420, Intel 11th Gen i7-1185G7 vPro,14"FHD,16GB,512GB PCIe SSD

Warranty status

ProSupport Plus⦁Expires 01 MAY 2024





Stay productive on the go with enterprise performance using the carbon fiber 14" Latitude 7420 Laptop from Dell. Designed to tackle your workflow in or out of the office, this laptop features an 11th Gen Intel Core i5 vPro cpu and 8GB RAM for powerful processing. The 14" Full HD IPS-type display and integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics ensure smooth on-screen action, while an HD webcam allows for easy video-conferencing. Stay safe with a TPM, lock slot, webcam privacy shutter, and fingerprint reader.

Store important files locally using the 256GB M.2 SSD. Need more space? Connect external drives or other wired accessories via a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A and two Thunderbolt 4 ports. Or, connect to peripherals or go online wirelessly with Bluetooth 5.1 and Wi-Fi 6, respectively. Extend or mirror content to additional monitors using the HDMI and Thunderbolt 4 ports. An integrated microSD card reader also allows for easy access to compatible memory cards. The Dell Latitude 7420 runs on the Windows 10 Pro 64-bit operating system.

Intel EVO

The Intel EVO platform is a design standard that includes technologies that are built specifically to enhance laptop experiences. Features include 11th generation Intel Core processors, integrated Intel Iris X graphics that accelerates photo and video editing, razor-thin bezels on screens, built-in Wi-Fi 6, and nine or more hours of battery life with Full HD displays. Thunderbolt 4 technology allows you to transfer up to 40 Gb/s with compatible daisy-chained devices such as monitors and storage drives using a single cable.

USB 3.2 Gen 1

USB 3.2 Gen 1 features a maximum throughput of 5 Gb/s and is synonymous with USB 3.1 Gen 1 and USB 3.0.

ExpressConnect

ExpressConnect automatically joins the strongest access point in the office and directs bandwidth to critical applications, wherever you work.

ExpressResponse

With Intel Adaptix Technology, prioritize important apps so they open faster and perform better.

ExpressCharge

Dell Optimizer extends runtime and improves battery performance by adapting to your patterns. Recharge up to 80% in just an hour, thanks to ExpressCharge.

Intelligent Audio

Collaborate like you're in the same room. Intelligent Audio enhances your audio quality and reduces background noises, so you can hear and be heard, creating a better conference experience for all.

Jump into Work

Power on by opening the lid, then stay synced, thanks to Modern Standby capability. Log in instantly with just a touch using the integrated fingerprint reader on the power button.

Intel vPro

Get optimized platform integrity and easy out-of-band management with Intel vPro. In addition to improved security, this technology ensures efficient IT upgrades.

Work Fast, Stay Cool

Dell's unique Dual Opposite Outlet fans provide efficient cooling in a compact size. Side venting increases efficiency and maximizes airflow to improve system response time, battery life, and quietness. IT can manage thermals within the BIOS, which saves on storage size and allows IT to focus on other work.

Keep Work Private

The Latitude 7420 features SafeScreen and a camera privacy shutter to keep out prying eyes.

Refreshed Feel

A refreshed keyboard design and touchpad with quiet operation and larger surface area offer more precision and comfort over older Latitude models.

Commitment to Sustainability

A lighter PC containing more recyclable carbon fiber than other Latitude laptops, the 7420 sports low VOC waterborne paint on 100% of painted parts, which is intended to create a healthier work environment. Furthermore, this laptop is EPEAT Gold registered.
